verses.verse: וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> I lifted up עֵינַ֛י <WH5869> mine eyes וָאֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> again and looked וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> and behold a man וּבְיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his hand חֶ֥בֶל <WH2256> line מִדָּֽה׃ <WH4060> with a measuring

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> Then said אָ֖נָה <WH575> Where אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> Whither הֹלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> I Whither goest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> thou? And he said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me לָמֹד֙ <WH4058> unto me To measure אֶת־ <WH853> יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to see כַּמָּֽה־ <WH4100> what רָחְבָּ֖הּ <WH7341> [is] the breadth וְכַמָּ֥ה <WH4100> is and how אָרְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH753> thereof and what [is] the length

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> and behold הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <WH4397> And behold the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֖י יֹצֵ֑א <WH3318> with me went forth וּמַלְאָ֣ךְ <WH4397> angel אַחֵ֔ר <WH312> and another יֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> went out לִקְרָאתֽוֹ׃ <WH7125> to meet

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said אֵלָ֔ו <WH413> to him רֻ֗ץ <WH7323> unto him Run דַּבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> young man הַלָּ֖ז <WH1975> to this לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying פְּרָזוֹת֙ <WH6519> [as] towns without walls תֵּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> shall be inhabited יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem מֵרֹ֥ב <WH7230> for the multitude אָדָ֛ם <WH120> of men וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> and cattle בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> therein

וַאֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּהּ֙ נְאֻם־ <WH5002> For I saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God ח֥וֹמַת <WH2346> will be unto her a wall אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וּלְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> and will be the glory אֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become בְתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> in the midst פ

ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Ho ה֗וֹי <WH1945> ho וְנֻ֛סוּ <WH5127> [come forth] and flee מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> from the land צָפ֖וֹן <WH6828> of the north נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֠י <WH3588> for כְּאַרְבַּ֞ע <WH702> as the four רוּח֧וֹת <WH7307> winds הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <WH8064> of the heaven פֵּרַ֥שְׂתִּי <WH6566> for I have spread you abroad אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
ה֥וֹי <WH1945> thyself O צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> Zion הִמָּלְטִ֑י <WH4422> Deliver יוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> that dwellest בַּת־ <WH1323> [with] the daughter בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <WH6635> of hosts אַחַ֣ר <WH310> After כָּב֔וֹד <WH3519> the glory שְׁלָחַ֕נִי <WH7971> hath he sent אֶל־ <WH413> against הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> me unto the nations הַשֹּׁלְלִ֣ים <WH7997> which spoiled אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> כִּ֚י <WH3588> for הַנֹּגֵ֣עַ <WH5060> you for he that toucheth בָּכֶ֔ם נֹגֵ֖עַ <WH5060> you toucheth בְּבָבַ֥ת <WH892> the apple עֵינֽוֹ׃ <WH5869> of his eye

כִּ֠י <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵנִ֤יף <WH5130> For behold I will shake אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> over וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become שָׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> upon them and they shall be a spoil לְעַבְדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5650> bondage וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁלָחָֽנִי׃ <WH7971> hath sent ס

רָנִּ֥י <WH7442> Sing וְשִׂמְחִ֖י <WH8055> and rejoice בַּת־ <WH1323> O daughter צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> of Zion כִּ֧י <WH3588> for הִנְנִי־ <WH2005> behold בָ֛א <WH935> for lo I come וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֥י <WH7931> and I will dwell בְתוֹכֵ֖ךְ <WH8432> in the midst נְאֻם־ <WH5002> of thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְנִלְווּ֩ <WH3867> shall be joined גוֹיִ֨ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֤ים <WH7227> And many אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> to the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְהָ֥יוּ <WH1961> and will become לִ֖י לְעָ֑ם <WH5971> and shall be my people וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֣י <WH7931> and I will dwell בְתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> in the midst וְיָדַ֕עַתְּ <WH3045> of thee and thou shalt know כִּי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <WH7971> hath sent אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH413> about

וְנָחַ֨ל <WH5157> shall inherit יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> Judah חֶלְק֔וֹ <WH2506> his portion עַ֖ל <WH5921> and אַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> land הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy וּבָחַ֥ר <WH977> and shall choose ע֖וֹד <WH5750> and will again בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

הַ֥ס <WH2013> Be silent כָּל־ <WH3605> all בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> O all flesh מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נֵע֖וֹר <WH5782> for he is raised up מִמְּע֥וֹן <WH4583> habitation קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> out of his holy ס
